name: Early Care & Education
description: Mission Neighborhood Centers, Inc. provides comprehensive child development services in San Francisco. - Head Start; Available - part/full-day, ages 3 - 5 - Special Enhancements - Early childhood Environmental Rating Scale (ECERS), The Classroom Assessment Scoring System (CLASS) - School Readiness - prepare attitude for success in school and learning in life MNC’s 10 campuses are in Alemany, Mission, Excelsior, Bayview Hunter’s Point, and Mission Bay neighborhoods. howToGetIt: Each service has separate applications/processes. Call 415-470-8555 for more information Please take a picture of the following documents and send by email to applyatmnc@mncsf.org or text message (415) 470-8555 : For more Information Please Contact us at: (415) 920-0123 Online ENROLLMENT or for direct URL to information location at https://www.childplus.net/apply/en-us/D83F78C6905C877C04EC9971A3B6654D/A744DE8A33724697077B1C3B6C800F85
